1.0.name: wordpress/picdonkey
1.0.description:
Show Thumbnails of webpages just with a simple ubb code: Use [thumb]http://www.homepage.com[/thumb] in your articles and you have linked thumbnails. If you want to style your thumbnails you just have to use the css class picdonkey.

Only 1-2 Minutes and the thumbnails snapshots are generated. This takes some time, because the server has to deliver many thumbnails at one time. Once cached (1-2minutes), the thumbnails will appear.
